properties.body:
ARCTIC.
1. THE INTERNATIONAL MARITIME ORGANIZATION (IMO), THE
   INTERNATIONAL HYDROGRAPHIC ORGANIZATION (IHO) AND
   THE WORLD METEOROLOGICAL ORGANIZATION (WMO) ANNOUNCE
   THE ESTABLISHMENT OF FIVE NEW ARCTIC NAVAREAS/METAREAS
   AS PART OF THE EXPANSION OF THE IMO/IHO WORLD-WIDE
   NAVIGATIONAL WARNING SERVICE (WWNWS) INTO ARCTIC WATERS.
2. WARNINGS FOR THIS REGION ARE CURRENTLY BEING ISSUED AS
   ARCTIC MARITIME SAFETY INFORMATION (AMSI). EFFECTIVE
   IMMEDIATELY, NGA WILL NO LONGER ISSUE AMSI MSGS. NGA
   HAS ESTABLISHED A NEW MSG CATERGORY FOR ALL BROADCAST
   WARNINGS WITHIN THE ARCTIC OCEAN REGION. THESE WARNINGS
   WILL BE ISSUED AS A HYDROARC. ALL AMSI MSGS WILL REMAIN
   IN EFFECT UNTIL CANCELLED BY THE CORRESPONDING HYDROARC.
3. COMMANDS WHO CURRENTLY RECEIVE ARCTIC MARITIME SAFETY
   INFORMATION WILL CONTINUE TO RECEIVE THIS BROADCAST.
   ANY COMMAND WHO HAS AN INTEREST IN THE ARCTIC REGION AND
   WOULD LIKE TO RECEIVE THESE BROADCAST WARNINGS, CONTACT
   THE WORLD WIDE NAVIGATIONAL WARNING SERVICE 24 HR WATCH
   DESK, PHONE: 301 227 3147, DSN: 287 3147,
   E-MAIL: NAVSAFETY@NGA.MIL.
